H0.text: what is the highest scoring letter in scrabble. J

H1.text: what is the highest scoring letter in scrabble. X

H2.text: what is the highest scoring letter in scrabble. Z

H3.text: what is the highest scoring letter in scrabble. Q

A4.text: In standard English Scrabble, Q is worth 10 points, which is higher than J (8 points), X (8 points), and Z (10 points). However, both Q and Z share the highest score.

A5.text: In standard English Scrabble, Z is worth 10 points, which is higher than J (8 points), X (8 points), and Q (10 points). However, both Q and Z share the highest score.

A6.text: In standard English Scrabble, J is worth 8 points, which is lower than Q (10 points) and Z (10 points).

A7.text: In standard English Scrabble, X is worth 8 points, which is lower than Q (10 points) and Z (10 points).
